constituent: lose weight, sickness, hospital, Buddha’s hand, monkey, sun, day, stick, crotch
koohiiStory1: The most horrific way to lose weight is from that devastating sickness that came from a monkey's crotch.
koohiiStory2: The poor monkey obviously had a sickness. He was scratching his crotch the whole time and when he started to lose weight heavily, the caretakers knew they couldn´t save him anymore.
onYomi: ソウ、チュウ、シュウ、シュ
